query.name: com.gpsmxp.students.contacts.byOrigContactType
query.description: Students: Contacts by OrigContactType - Comprehensive data for all six original contact types. Also includes Student fields
query.sql:
WITH OriginalContactAssoc AS ( SELECT sca.StudentDcid AS StudentDcid, sca.PersonId AS PersonId, ocm.OriginalContactType AS OriginalContactType, csrel.Code AS contactRelationshipType, scd.IsCustodial AS contactIsCustodialFlg, scd.IsEmergency AS contactIsEmergencyFlg, scd.LivesWithFlg AS contactLivesWithFlg, scd.ReceivesMailFlg AS contactReceivesMailFlg, scd.SchoolPickupFlg AS contactSchoolPickupFlg
FROM StudentContactAssoc sca
JOIN OriginalContactMap ocm ON sca.StudentContactAssocid = ocm.StudentContactAssocId
JOIN StudentContactDetail scd ON sca.StudentContactAssocId = scd.StudentContactAssocId AND scd.IsActive = 1 AND (scd.EndDate IS NULL OR scd.EndDate > (SELECT SYSTIMESTAMP FROM Dual)) AND (scd.StartDate IS NULL OR scd.StartDate <= (SELECT SYSTIMESTAMP FROM Dual))
JOIN CodeSet csrel ON scd.RelationshipTypeCodeSetId = csrel.CodeSetId ), PrimPersPhonesByType AS ( SELECT ppna.PersonId AS PersonId, ppna.PhoneTypeCodeSetID AS PhoneTypeCodeSetID, ppna.IsPreferred AS IsPreferred, ppna.PhoneNumberPriorityOrder AS PhoneNumberPriorityOrder, ppna.PhoneNumberAsEntered AS PhoneNumberAsEntered, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY ppna.PersonId, ppna.PhoneTypeCodeSetID ORDER BY ppna.IsPreferred DESC, ppna.PhoneNumberPriorityOrder ASC, ppna.PhoneNumberAsEntered) AS PhonePriByType
FROM PersonPhoneNumberAssoc ppna
JOIN PhoneNumber pn ON ppna.PhoneNumberId = pn.PhoneNumberID ), PrimPersEmailAddr AS ( SELECT peaa.PersonId AS PersonId, peaa.EmailTypeCodeSetID AS EmailTypeCodeSetID, peaa.IsPrimaryEmailAddress AS IsPrimaryEmailAddress, peaa.EmailAddressPriorityOrder AS EmailAddressPriorityOrder, emad.EmailAddress AS EmailAddress, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY peaa.PersonId ORDER BY peaa.IsPrimaryEmailAddress DESC, CASE WHEN cset.Code IS NULL THEN 2 WHEN cset.Code LIKE '' THEN 2 ELSE 1 END ASC, peaa.EmailAddressPriorityOrder ASC) AS EmailPri
FROM PersonEmailAddressAssoc peaa
JOIN EmailAddress emad ON peaa.EmailAddressId = emad.EmailAddressId
LEFT OUTER JOIN CodeSet cset ON peaa.EmailTypeCodeSetID = cset.CodeSetID AND cset.Code LIKE 'Current'
ORDER BY peaa.PersonId ), PrimPersStreetAddr As( SELECT paa.PersonId AS PersonId, paa.AddressTypeCodeSetID AS AddressTypeCodeSetID, paa.AddressPriorityOrder AS AddressPriorityOrder,
pad.Street AS contactAddrStreet, pad.Unit AS contactAddrUnit, pad.LineTwo AS contactAddrLineTwo, pad.City AS contactAddrCity, csas.Code AS contactAddrState, pad.PostalCode as contactAddrPostalCode, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY paa.PersonId ORDER BY paa.AddressPriorityOrder ASC) AS StreetAddrPri
FROM PersonAddressAssoc paa
JOIN PersonAddress pad ON paa.PersonAddressId = pad.PersonAddressId JOIN CodeSet csas ON pad.StatesCodeSetID = csas.CodeSetID
WHERE (paa.EndDate IS NULL OR paa.EndDate > (SELECT SYSTIMESTAMP FROM Dual)) AND (paa.StartDate IS NULL OR paa.StartDate <= (SELECT SYSTIMESTAMP FROM Dual)) ), ContactInfo AS ( SELECT p.Id AS PersonId, p.FirstName AS contactFirstName, p.MiddleName AS contactMiddleName, p.LastName AS contactLastName, pppbt_home.PhoneNumberAsEntered AS HomePhoneNum, pppbt_mobile.PhoneNumberAsEntered AS MobilePhoneNum, pppbt_work.PhoneNumberAsEntered AS WorkPhoneNum, LOWER(cset.Code) AS emailType, ppea.EmailAddress as contactEmailAddr, ppea.EmailAddressPriorityOrder, ppea.IsPrimaryEmailAddress, LOWER(csat.Code) AS addressType, ppsa.contactAddrStreet AS contactAddrStreet, ppsa.contactAddrUnit AS contactAddrUnit, ppsa.contactAddrLineTwo AS contactAddrLineTwo, ppsa.contactAddrCity AS contactAddrCity, ppsa.contactAddrState AS contactAddrState, ppsa.contactAddrPostalCode as contactAddrPostalCode
FROM Person p
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( (SELECT * FROM PrimPersPhonesByType) pppbt_home
INNER JOIN CodeSet cspt_home ON pppbt_home.PhoneTypeCodeSetID = cspt_home.CodeSetID AND cspt_home.Code LIKE 'Home'
) ON p.Id = pppbt_home.PersonId AND pppbt_home.PhonePriByType = 1
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( (SELECT * FROM PrimPersPhonesByType) pppbt_mobile
INNER JOIN CodeSet cspt_mobile ON pppbt_mobile.PhoneTypeCodeSetID = cspt_mobile.CodeSetID AND cspt_mobile.Code LIKE 'Mobile'
) ON p.Id = pppbt_mobile.PersonId AND pppbt_mobile.PhonePriByType = 1
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( (SELECT * FROM PrimPersPhonesByType) pppbt_work
INNER JOIN CodeSet pppbt_work ON pppbt_work.PhoneTypeCodeSetID = pppbt_work.CodeSetID AND pppbt_work.Code LIKE 'Work'
) ON p.Id = pppbt_work.PersonId AND pppbt_work.PhonePriByType = 1
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( (SELECT * FROM PrimPersEmailAddr) ppea
INNER JOIN CodeSet cset ON ppea.EmailTypeCodeSetID = cset.CodeSetID
) ON p.Id = ppea.PersonId AND ppea.EmailPri = 1
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( (SELECT * FROM PrimPersStreetAddr) ppsa
INNER JOIN CodeSet csat ON ppsa.AddressTypeCodeSetID = csat.CodeSetID
) ON p.Id = ppsa.PersonId AND ppsa.StreetAddrPri = 1 ) SELECT s.Dcid As studentDcid, s.Enroll_Status AS enrollStat, s.Student_Number AS studentNum, s.Last_Name AS lname, s.First_Name AS fname, psc.Email AS studentEmail, s.Gender AS gender, s.SchoolID AS schoolNum, s.Grade_Level AS gradeLvl, s.Home_room AS homeRm, s.Next_School AS nextSchool, s.Sched_NextYearGrade AS nextGrade, s.Home_Phone AS studentHomePhone, s.Street AS studentAddrStreet, s.City AS studentAddrCity, s.State AS studentAddrState, s.Zip as studentAddrZip, s.Mailing_Street AS studentMailAddrStreet, s.Mailing_City AS studentMailAddrCity, s.Mailing_State AS studentMailAddrState, s.Mailing_Zip as studentMailAddrZip,
oca_m1.contactRelationshipType AS MotherRelationshipType, ci_m1.contactFirstName AS MotherFirstName, ci_m1.contactMiddleName AS MotherMiddleName, ci_m1.contactLastName AS MotherLastName, oca_m1.contactIsCustodialFlg AS MotherIsCustodialFlg, oca_m1.contactIsEmergencyFlg AS MotherIsEmergencyFlg, oca_m1.contactLivesWithFlg AS MotherLivesWithFlg, oca_m1.contactReceivesMailFlg AS MotherReceivesMailFlg, oca_m1.contactSchoolPickupFlg AS MotherSchoolPickupFlg, ci_m1.contactEmailAddr AS MotherEmailAddress, ci_m1.HomePhoneNum AS MotherHomePhone, ci_m1.MobilePhoneNum AS MotherMobilePhone, ci_m1.WorkPhoneNum AS MotherWorkPhone, ci_m1.contactAddrStreet AS MotherAddrStreet, ci_m1.contactAddrUnit AS MotherAddrUnit, ci_m1.contactAddrLineTwo AS MotherAddrLineTwo, ci_m1.contactAddrCity AS MotherAddrCity, ci_m1.contactAddrState AS MotherAddrState, ci_m1.contactAddrPostalCode as MotherAddrPostalCode,
oca_f2.contactRelationshipType AS FatherRelationshipType, ci_f2.contactFirstName AS FatherFirstName, ci_f2.contactMiddleName AS FatherMiddleName, ci_f2.contactLastName AS FatherLastName, oca_f2.contactIsCustodialFlg AS FatherIsCustodialFlg, oca_f2.contactIsEmergencyFlg AS FatherIsEmergencyFlg, oca_f2.contactLivesWithFlg AS FatherLivesWithFlg, oca_f2.contactReceivesMailFlg AS FatherReceivesMailFlg, oca_f2.contactSchoolPickupFlg AS FatherSchoolPickupFlg, ci_f2.contactEmailAddr AS FatherEmailAddress, ci_f2.HomePhoneNum AS FatherHomePhone, ci_f2.MobilePhoneNum AS FatherMobilePhone, ci_f2.WorkPhoneNum AS FatherWorkPhone, ci_f2.contactAddrStreet AS FatherAddrStreet, ci_f2.contactAddrUnit AS FatherAddrUnit, ci_f2.contactAddrLineTwo AS FatherAddrLineTwo, ci_f2.contactAddrCity AS FatherAddrCity, ci_f2.contactAddrState AS FatherAddrState, ci_f2.contactAddrPostalCode AS FatherAddrPostalCode,
oca_g3.contactRelationshipType AS GuardianRelationshipType, ci_g3.contactFirstName AS GuardianFirstName, ci_g3.contactMiddleName AS GuardianMiddleName, ci_g3.contactLastName AS GuardianLastName, oca_g3.contactIsCustodialFlg AS GuardianIsCustodialFlg, oca_g3.contactIsEmergencyFlg AS GuardianIsEmergencyFlg, oca_g3.contactLivesWithFlg AS GuardianLivesWithFlg, oca_g3.contactReceivesMailFlg AS GuardianReceivesMailFlg, oca_g3.contactSchoolPickupFlg AS GuardianSchoolPickupFlg, ci_g3.contactEmailAddr AS GuardianEmailAddress, ci_g3.HomePhoneNum AS GuardianHomePhone, ci_g3.MobilePhoneNum AS GuardianMobilePhone, ci_g3.WorkPhoneNum AS GuardianWorkPhone, ci_g3.contactAddrStreet AS GuardianAddrStreet, ci_g3.contactAddrUnit AS GuardianAddrUnit, ci_g3.contactAddrLineTwo AS GuardianAddrLineTwo, ci_g3.contactAddrCity AS GuardianAddrCity, ci_g3.contactAddrState AS GuardianAddrState, ci_g3.contactAddrPostalCode AS GuardianAddrPostalCode,
oca_e1.contactRelationshipType AS Emergency1RelationshipType, ci_e1.contactFirstName AS Emergency1FirstName, ci_e1.contactMiddleName AS Emergency1MiddleName, ci_e1.contactLastName AS Emergency1LastName, oca_e1.contactIsCustodialFlg AS Emergency1IsCustodialFlg, oca_e1.contactIsEmergencyFlg AS Emergency1IsEmergencyFlg, oca_e1.contactLivesWithFlg AS Emergency1LivesWithFlg, oca_e1.contactReceivesMailFlg AS Emergency1ReceivesMailFlg, oca_e1.contactSchoolPickupFlg AS Emergency1SchoolPickupFlg, ci_e1.contactEmailAddr AS Emergency1EmailAddress, ci_e1.HomePhoneNum AS Emergency1HomePhone, ci_e1.MobilePhoneNum AS Emergency1MobilePhone, ci_e1.WorkPhoneNum AS Emergency1WorkPhone, ci_e1.contactAddrStreet AS Emergency1AddrStreet, ci_e1.contactAddrUnit AS Emergency1AddrUnit, ci_e1.contactAddrLineTwo AS Emergency1AddrLineTwo, ci_e1.contactAddrCity AS Emergency1AddrCity, ci_e1.contactAddrState AS Emergency1AddrState, ci_e1.contactAddrPostalCode as Emergency1AddrPostalCode,
oca_e2.contactRelationshipType AS Emergency2RelationshipType, ci_e2.contactFirstName AS Emergency2FirstName, ci_e2.contactMiddleName AS Emergency2MiddleName, ci_e2.contactLastName AS Emergency2LastName, oca_e2.contactIsCustodialFlg AS Emergency2IsCustodialFlg, oca_e2.contactIsEmergencyFlg AS Emergency2IsEmergencyFlg, oca_e2.contactLivesWithFlg AS Emergency2LivesWithFlg, oca_e2.contactReceivesMailFlg AS Emergency2ReceivesMailFlg, oca_e2.contactSchoolPickupFlg AS Emergency2SchoolPickupFlg, ci_e2.contactEmailAddr AS Emergency2EmailAddress, ci_e2.HomePhoneNum AS Emergency2HomePhone, ci_e2.MobilePhoneNum AS Emergency2MobilePhone, ci_e2.WorkPhoneNum AS Emergency2WorkPhone, ci_e2.contactAddrStreet AS Emergency2AddrStreet, ci_e2.contactAddrUnit AS Emergency2AddrUnit, ci_e2.contactAddrLineTwo AS Emergency2AddrLineTwo, ci_e2.contactAddrCity AS Emergency2AddrCity, ci_e2.contactAddrState AS Emergency2AddrState, ci_e2.contactAddrPostalCode AS Emergency2AddrPostalCode,
oca_e3.contactRelationshipType AS Emergency3RelationshipType, ci_e3.contactFirstName AS Emergency3FirstName, ci_e3.contactMiddleName AS Emergency3MiddleName, ci_e3.contactLastName AS Emergency3LastName, oca_e3.contactIsCustodialFlg AS Emergency3IsCustodialFlg, oca_e3.contactIsEmergencyFlg AS Emergency3IsEmergencyFlg, oca_e3.contactLivesWithFlg AS Emergency3LivesWithFlg, oca_e3.contactReceivesMailFlg AS Emergency3ReceivesMailFlg, oca_e3.contactSchoolPickupFlg AS Emergency3SchoolPickupFlg, ci_e3.contactEmailAddr AS Emergency3EmailAddress, ci_e3.HomePhoneNum AS Emergency3HomePhone, ci_e3.MobilePhoneNum AS Emergency3MobilePhone, ci_e3.WorkPhoneNum AS Emergency3WorkPhone, ci_e3.contactAddrStreet AS Emergency3AddrStreet, ci_e3.contactAddrUnit AS Emergency3AddrUnit, ci_e3.contactAddrLineTwo AS Emergency3AddrLineTwo, ci_e3.contactAddrCity AS Emergency3AddrCity, ci_e3.contactAddrState AS Emergency3AddrState, ci_e3.contactAddrPostalCode AS Emergency3AddrPostalCode
FROM Students s
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( PSM_StudentContact psc
INNER JOIN PSM_StudentContactType psct ON psc.StudentContactTypeId= psct.Id AND psct.Name LIKE 'Self'
INNER JOIN Sync_StudentMap ssm ON psc.StudentId = ssm.StudentId
) ON s.Dcid = ssm.StudentsDcid
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( (SELECT * FROM OriginalContactAssoc) oca_m1
INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM ContactInfo) ci_m1 ON oca_m1.PersonId = ci_m1.PersonId
) ON s.Dcid = oca_m1.StudentDcid AND oca_m1.OriginalContactType LIKE 'mother'
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( (SELECT * FROM OriginalContactAssoc) oca_f2
INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM ContactInfo) ci_f2 ON oca_f2.PersonId = ci_f2.PersonId
) ON s.Dcid = oca_f2.StudentDcid AND oca_f2.OriginalContactType LIKE 'father'
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( (SELECT * FROM OriginalContactAssoc) oca_g3
INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM ContactInfo) ci_g3 ON oca_g3.PersonId = ci_g3.PersonId
) ON s.Dcid = oca_g3.StudentDcid AND oca_g3.OriginalContactType LIKE 'guardian'
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( (SELECT * FROM OriginalContactAssoc) oca_e1
INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM ContactInfo) ci_e1 ON oca_e1.PersonId = ci_e1.PersonId
) ON s.Dcid = oca_e1.StudentDcid AND oca_e1.OriginalContactType LIKE 'emergency1'
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( (SELECT * FROM OriginalContactAssoc) oca_e2
INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM ContactInfo) ci_e2 ON oca_e2.PersonId = ci_e2.PersonId
) ON s.Dcid = oca_e2.StudentDcid AND oca_e2.OriginalContactType LIKE 'emergency2'
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( (SELECT * FROM OriginalContactAssoc) oca_e3
INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM ContactInfo) ci_e3 ON oca_e3.PersonId = ci_e3.PersonId
) ON s.Dcid = oca_e3.StudentDcid AND oca_e3.OriginalContactType LIKE 'emergency3'
ORDER BY s.Student_Number ASC, s.Dcid ASC

query.name: com.gpsmxp.students.contacts.byOrigContactTypePrimary3EmailPhone
query.summary: Students: Contacts by OrigContactType - Email and Phones 3 (M,F,G)
query.description: Students: Contacts by OrigContactType - Email and Phone numbers for Primary 3 contact types (Mother, Father and Guardian). Also includes Student fields
query.sql:
WITH OriginalContactAssoc AS ( SELECT sca.StudentDcid AS StudentDcid, sca.PersonId AS PersonId, ocm.OriginalContactType AS OriginalContactType, csrel.Code AS contactRelationshipType, scd.IsCustodial AS contactIsCustodialFlg, scd.IsEmergency AS contactIsEmergencyFlg, scd.LivesWithFlg AS contactLivesWithFlg, scd.ReceivesMailFlg AS contactReceivesMailFlg, scd.SchoolPickupFlg AS contactSchoolPickupFlg
FROM StudentContactAssoc sca
JOIN OriginalContactMap ocm ON sca.StudentContactAssocid = ocm.StudentContactAssocId
JOIN StudentContactDetail scd ON sca.StudentContactAssocId = scd.StudentContactAssocId AND scd.IsActive = 1 AND (scd.EndDate IS NULL OR scd.EndDate > (SELECT SYSTIMESTAMP FROM Dual)) AND (scd.StartDate IS NULL OR scd.StartDate <= (SELECT SYSTIMESTAMP FROM Dual))
JOIN CodeSet csrel ON scd.RelationshipTypeCodeSetId = csrel.CodeSetId ), PrimPersPhonesByType AS ( SELECT ppna.PersonId AS PersonId, ppna.PhoneTypeCodeSetID AS PhoneTypeCodeSetID, ppna.IsPreferred AS IsPreferred, ppna.PhoneNumberPriorityOrder AS PhoneNumberPriorityOrder, ppna.PhoneNumberAsEntered AS PhoneNumberAsEntered, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY ppna.PersonId, ppna.PhoneTypeCodeSetID ORDER BY ppna.IsPreferred DESC, ppna.PhoneNumberPriorityOrder ASC, ppna.PhoneNumberAsEntered) AS PhonePriByType
FROM PersonPhoneNumberAssoc ppna
JOIN PhoneNumber pn ON ppna.PhoneNumberId = pn.PhoneNumberID ), PrimPersEmailAddr AS ( SELECT peaa.PersonId AS PersonId, peaa.EmailTypeCodeSetID AS EmailTypeCodeSetID, peaa.IsPrimaryEmailAddress AS IsPrimaryEmailAddress, peaa.EmailAddressPriorityOrder AS EmailAddressPriorityOrder, emad.EmailAddress AS EmailAddress, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY peaa.PersonId ORDER BY peaa.IsPrimaryEmailAddress DESC, CASE WHEN cset.Code IS NULL THEN 2 WHEN cset.Code LIKE '' THEN 2 ELSE 1 END ASC, peaa.EmailAddressPriorityOrder ASC) AS EmailPri
FROM PersonEmailAddressAssoc peaa
JOIN EmailAddress emad ON peaa.EmailAddressId = emad.EmailAddressId
LEFT OUTER JOIN CodeSet cset ON peaa.EmailTypeCodeSetID = cset.CodeSetID AND cset.Code LIKE 'Current'
ORDER BY peaa.PersonId ), PrimPersStreetAddr As( SELECT paa.PersonId AS PersonId, paa.AddressTypeCodeSetID AS AddressTypeCodeSetID, paa.AddressPriorityOrder AS AddressPriorityOrder,
pad.Street AS contactAddrStreet, pad.Unit AS contactAddrUnit, pad.LineTwo AS contactAddrLineTwo, pad.City AS contactAddrCity, csas.Code AS contactAddrState, pad.PostalCode as contactAddrPostalCode, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY paa.PersonId ORDER BY paa.AddressPriorityOrder ASC) AS StreetAddrPri
FROM PersonAddressAssoc paa
JOIN PersonAddress pad ON paa.PersonAddressId = pad.PersonAddressId JOIN CodeSet csas ON pad.StatesCodeSetID = csas.CodeSetID
WHERE (paa.EndDate IS NULL OR paa.EndDate > (SELECT SYSTIMESTAMP FROM Dual)) AND (paa.StartDate IS NULL OR paa.StartDate <= (SELECT SYSTIMESTAMP FROM Dual)) ), ContactInfo AS ( SELECT p.Id AS PersonId, p.FirstName AS contactFirstName, p.MiddleName AS contactMiddleName, p.LastName AS contactLastName, pppbt_home.PhoneNumberAsEntered AS HomePhoneNum, pppbt_mobile.PhoneNumberAsEntered AS MobilePhoneNum, pppbt_work.PhoneNumberAsEntered AS WorkPhoneNum, LOWER(cset.Code) AS emailType, ppea.EmailAddress as contactEmailAddr, ppea.EmailAddressPriorityOrder, ppea.IsPrimaryEmailAddress, LOWER(csat.Code) AS addressType, ppsa.contactAddrStreet AS contactAddrStreet, ppsa.contactAddrUnit AS contactAddrUnit, ppsa.contactAddrLineTwo AS contactAddrLineTwo, ppsa.contactAddrCity AS contactAddrCity, ppsa.contactAddrState AS contactAddrState, ppsa.contactAddrPostalCode as contactAddrPostalCode
FROM Person p
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( (SELECT * FROM PrimPersPhonesByType) pppbt_home
INNER JOIN CodeSet cspt_home ON pppbt_home.PhoneTypeCodeSetID = cspt_home.CodeSetID AND cspt_home.Code LIKE 'Home'
) ON p.Id = pppbt_home.PersonId AND pppbt_home.PhonePriByType = 1
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( (SELECT * FROM PrimPersPhonesByType) pppbt_mobile
INNER JOIN CodeSet cspt_mobile ON pppbt_mobile.PhoneTypeCodeSetID = cspt_mobile.CodeSetID AND cspt_mobile.Code LIKE 'Mobile'
) ON p.Id = pppbt_mobile.PersonId AND pppbt_mobile.PhonePriByType = 1
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( (SELECT * FROM PrimPersPhonesByType) pppbt_work
INNER JOIN CodeSet pppbt_work ON pppbt_work.PhoneTypeCodeSetID = pppbt_work.CodeSetID AND pppbt_work.Code LIKE 'Work'
) ON p.Id = pppbt_work.PersonId AND pppbt_work.PhonePriByType = 1
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( (SELECT * FROM PrimPersEmailAddr) ppea
INNER JOIN CodeSet cset ON ppea.EmailTypeCodeSetID = cset.CodeSetID
) ON p.Id = ppea.PersonId AND ppea.EmailPri = 1
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( (SELECT * FROM PrimPersStreetAddr) ppsa
INNER JOIN CodeSet csat ON ppsa.AddressTypeCodeSetID = csat.CodeSetID
) ON p.Id = ppsa.PersonId AND ppsa.StreetAddrPri = 1 ) SELECT s.Dcid As studentDcid, s.Enroll_Status AS enrollStat, s.Student_Number AS studentNum, s.Last_Name AS lname, s.First_Name AS fname, psc.Email AS studentEmail, s.Gender AS gender, s.SchoolID AS schoolNum, s.Grade_Level AS gradeLvl, s.Home_room AS homeRm, s.Next_School AS nextSchool, s.Sched_NextYearGrade AS nextGrade, s.Home_Phone AS studentHomePhone, s.Street AS studentAddrStreet, s.City AS studentAddrCity, s.State AS studentAddrState, s.Zip as studentAddrZip, s.Mailing_Street AS studentMailAddrStreet, s.Mailing_City AS studentMailAddrCity, s.Mailing_State AS studentMailAddrState, s.Mailing_Zip as studentMailAddrZip,
oca_m1.contactRelationshipType AS MotherRelationshipType, ci_m1.contactFirstName AS MotherFirstName, ci_m1.contactMiddleName AS MotherMiddleName, ci_m1.contactLastName AS MotherLastName, oca_m1.contactIsCustodialFlg AS MotherIsCustodialFlg, oca_m1.contactIsEmergencyFlg AS MotherIsEmergencyFlg, oca_m1.contactLivesWithFlg AS MotherLivesWithFlg, oca_m1.contactReceivesMailFlg AS MotherReceivesMailFlg, oca_m1.contactSchoolPickupFlg AS MotherSchoolPickupFlg, ci_m1.contactEmailAddr AS MotherEmailAddress, ci_m1.HomePhoneNum AS MotherHomePhone, ci_m1.MobilePhoneNum AS MotherMobilePhone, ci_m1.WorkPhoneNum AS MotherWorkPhone, ci_m1.contactAddrStreet AS MotherAddrStreet, ci_m1.contactAddrUnit AS MotherAddrUnit, ci_m1.contactAddrLineTwo AS MotherAddrLineTwo, ci_m1.contactAddrCity AS MotherAddrCity, ci_m1.contactAddrState AS MotherAddrState, ci_m1.contactAddrPostalCode as MotherAddrPostalCode,
oca_f2.contactRelationshipType AS FatherRelationshipType, ci_f2.contactFirstName AS FatherFirstName, ci_f2.contactMiddleName AS FatherMiddleName, ci_f2.contactLastName AS FatherLastName, oca_f2.contactIsCustodialFlg AS FatherIsCustodialFlg, oca_f2.contactIsEmergencyFlg AS FatherIsEmergencyFlg, oca_f2.contactLivesWithFlg AS FatherLivesWithFlg, oca_f2.contactReceivesMailFlg AS FatherReceivesMailFlg, oca_f2.contactSchoolPickupFlg AS FatherSchoolPickupFlg, ci_f2.contactEmailAddr AS FatherEmailAddress, ci_f2.HomePhoneNum AS FatherHomePhone, ci_f2.MobilePhoneNum AS FatherMobilePhone, ci_f2.WorkPhoneNum AS FatherWorkPhone, ci_f2.contactAddrStreet AS FatherAddrStreet, ci_f2.contactAddrUnit AS FatherAddrUnit, ci_f2.contactAddrLineTwo AS FatherAddrLineTwo, ci_f2.contactAddrCity AS FatherAddrCity, ci_f2.contactAddrState AS FatherAddrState, ci_f2.contactAddrPostalCode AS FatherAddrPostalCode,
oca_g3.contactRelationshipType AS GuardianRelationshipType, ci_g3.contactFirstName AS GuardianFirstName, ci_g3.contactMiddleName AS GuardianMiddleName, ci_g3.contactLastName AS GuardianLastName, oca_g3.contactIsCustodialFlg AS GuardianIsCustodialFlg, oca_g3.contactIsEmergencyFlg AS GuardianIsEmergencyFlg, oca_g3.contactLivesWithFlg AS GuardianLivesWithFlg, oca_g3.contactReceivesMailFlg AS GuardianReceivesMailFlg, oca_g3.contactSchoolPickupFlg AS GuardianSchoolPickupFlg, ci_g3.contactEmailAddr AS GuardianEmailAddress, ci_g3.HomePhoneNum AS GuardianHomePhone, ci_g3.MobilePhoneNum AS GuardianMobilePhone, ci_g3.WorkPhoneNum AS GuardianWorkPhone, ci_g3.contactAddrStreet AS GuardianAddrStreet, ci_g3.contactAddrUnit AS GuardianAddrUnit, ci_g3.contactAddrLineTwo AS GuardianAddrLineTwo, ci_g3.contactAddrCity AS GuardianAddrCity, ci_g3.contactAddrState AS GuardianAddrState, ci_g3.contactAddrPostalCode AS GuardianAddrPostalCode,
FROM Students s
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( PSM_StudentContact psc
INNER JOIN PSM_StudentContactType psct ON psc.StudentContactTypeId= psct.Id AND psct.Name LIKE 'Self'
INNER JOIN Sync_StudentMap ssm ON psc.StudentId = ssm.StudentId
) ON s.Dcid = ssm.StudentsDcid
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( (SELECT * FROM OriginalContactAssoc) oca_m1
INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM ContactInfo) ci_m1 ON oca_m1.PersonId = ci_m1.PersonId
) ON s.Dcid = oca_m1.StudentDcid AND oca_m1.OriginalContactType LIKE 'mother'
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( (SELECT * FROM OriginalContactAssoc) oca_f2
INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM ContactInfo) ci_f2 ON oca_f2.PersonId = ci_f2.PersonId
) ON s.Dcid = oca_f2.StudentDcid AND oca_f2.OriginalContactType LIKE 'father'
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( (SELECT * FROM OriginalContactAssoc) oca_g3
INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM ContactInfo) ci_g3 ON oca_g3.PersonId = ci_g3.PersonId
) ON s.Dcid = oca_g3.StudentDcid AND oca_g3.OriginalContactType LIKE 'guardian'
ORDER BY s.Student_Number ASC, s.Dcid ASC
